docs.text: Welcome Hello and welcome to my Home Assistant configuration. Thank you for stopping and checking it out. My configuration has moved from running on raspbian to HassIO and finally running under docker on the Intel Nuc. Bits and Bobs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home
